track.name: For the Night (feat. Lil Baby & DaBaby)

wiki.summary: “For the Night” is the 3rd track off of the late Pop Smoke’s album, Shoot for the Stars Aim for the Moon. Besides being off a highly anticipated album, the song was also highly popularized due to a Tiktok dance surrounding the song. This song marks the first collaboration between Pop, Lil Baby, and DaBaby. On a beat produced by CashMoneyAP and MIKE DEAN, the trio talk about their nighttime activities, how they act around women, and their now-lavish lifestyles. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “For the Night” is the 3rd track off of the late Pop Smoke’s album, Shoot for the Stars Aim for the Moon. Besides being off a highly anticipated album, the song was also highly popularized due to a Tiktok dance surrounding the song. This song marks the first collaboration between Pop, Lil Baby, and DaBaby. On a beat produced by CashMoneyAP and MIKE DEAN, the trio talk about their nighttime activities, how they act around women, and their now-lavish lifestyles. The song points to how the rappers don’t want a long-term relationship, wanting only a companion, “For the Night”. Read more on Last.fm.
